imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Warm, cozy family-blog logo mark with simple illustration style (family-blog-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide header banner in a warm scrapbook/journal aesthetic with subtle paper texture and gentle accents (family-blog-banner.dim_1600x500.png)

existing_features.title: Add Internet Identity authentication so family members can sign in/out and the UI can show the signed-in principal identity state.
Create the main blog UI: a posts feed page, post detail page, and a post editor (create + edit) that connects to the backend using React Query.
Add a consistent, creative visual theme for the family blog (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and apply it across all pages and components.
Add generated static image assets for the blog branding and render them in the UI (from frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a blog for the user's family (family blog app).

Implement backend data model and APIs to support a family blog with persistent posts: create post, list posts (newest first), get post by id, update post, and delete post, with each post associated to the author principal and timestamps.
